responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "562234F34EDEF5DA0D457D9A20E6BE0E", "Aye... this is what I feared. This isn\'t just faulty enchantments. This is a plague in the stone. See how it warps? How it festers? This is the true enemy, the one the old stories warned us about. Thraen can plan his careful campaigns against \'spirits,\' but this... this needs to be cut out, cauterized before it spreads further.")
name: ANV_FTUE_Dunir_BrimirColdchisel_9_Response
